title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5003.3 - Salaries for elected members of retirement board while on leave of absence during service on retirement board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5003.3 - Salaries for elected members of retirement board while on leave of absence during service on retirement board

State Regulations
A member of the system who has been elected to the retirement
board and who has been granted a leave of absence to serve on the board, pursuant to subdivision 6 of section
506
of the

Education Law, shall be entitled to use the salaries earned, as reported in
section
5015.2
of this Title, in the
calculation of final average salary so long as they meet all the other
requirements as specified in sections 5003.1 and
5003.2
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5003.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
